hangle: 만약 영애의 아버지가 억지로 시킨 거라면 방으로 돌아가.
first_translate: if your father  forced you into this, go back to your room now.
I’m here by my own will, your highness.
it’s not very modest for me to say so myself,
but I think I’d make quite a good wife.

hangle: 여태 어디서 거절당한 경험이 한 번도 없답니다.

first_translate: but there's no other woman besides fiona that matters to me.

hangle: 피오나 외의 여자는 아무런 의미도 없어.
first_translate: but there's no other woman besides fiona that matters to me.

hangle: 차라리 암살자였으면 두 동강을 냈을 텐데.
first_translate: had she come as an assassin, I would have killed her on the spot.

hangle: 게다가 피오나가 잔소리 한 것도 있고…
first_translate: not only did fiona scold me about being nice to ladies,
either she leaves, or I do.
did she try to tempt you with her body?!

hangle: 세상에, 우리 황자님이 출세를 하긴 했나 보네!
first_translate: wow! our little prince has grown up!
is it because I laughed at you?
to do such a bold thing--
siegren, you’re truly an homme fatale*!

hangle: 그 조그맣던 애가 이렇게 될 줄 누가…
first_translate: who could've imagined that tiny kid growing up to become like this...?
you don’t need to take long.
you don’t need to take long.

hangle: 사귀는 사이에 키스 정도로 이러는 것도 좀…
first_translate: a kiss shouldn’t cause all this fuss when we’re already dating...

hangle: 꼭 내가 사냥감이 된 기분이 드는데…
first_translate: I feel like I'm his prey...
all I wanted to do was give him a peck.
I’ll hit you if you keep going.

hangle: 나도 이 이상은 참기 힘들어서 안 할 거야.
first_translate: I also can’t hold out any longer, so let’s just stop.
the hiccuping stopped, so I'll head home now.
feel like I might fall for him even more than I am right now.
there’s a tea party today at the greenhouse.
wonder if I’ll see him there.
